alert.note: Alert for McHenry (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 05 at 9:43AM CDT until June 06 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the Souris River near Bantry affecting McHenry County... ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Souris River near Bantry. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow. * IMPACTS...At 1440.2 feet, Water begins crossing the road several hundred feet to the left of the bridge. No towns or major roads are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 1440.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling. - Flood stage is 1440.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
